title: Remove About stats blocks and footer caffeine.ai attribution

requirements.summary: Remove the 5+ Years Experience and 50+ Projects Completed statistic blocks from the About section.
acceptanceCriteria: The About section no longer displays a "5+" years experience statistic.
The About section no longer displays a "50+" projects/clients statistic.
No other part of the page contains the removed "5+" or "50+" stats text.

file_operations.description: In AboutSection, remove the two statistic cards that render "5+"/"Years Experience" and "50+"/"Projects Completed", ensuring those strings no longer appear anywhere in the rendered page.

requirements.summary: Remove the footer attribution line that says "Built with" and links to caffeine.ai from the bottom of the page.
acceptanceCriteria: The bottom-of-page/footer area no longer contains the text "Built with" and no longer links to "caffeine.ai".
No other part of the page contains any "made using caffeine ai" / "built with caffeine" attribution text.

file_operations.description: In ContactSection, remove the bottom attribution paragraph that includes "Built with" and the outbound link to "caffeine.ai", ensuring no equivalent attribution text remains anywhere on the page.
